profile.title: Corporate Profile
profile.subtitle: Part of Docaposte Group
profile.paragraph1: SERES is a pioneering technology company specializing in Secure Electronic Document Exchange Solutions. It acts as a Trusted Third Party to facilitate the digital transformation of businesses.
profile.paragraph2: It belongs to the French group Docaposte, a digital subsidiary of La Poste Group, which provides solid international backing and access to cutting-edge technologies in digital identity, certified archiving and digital trust.
profile.paragraph3: Its headquarters for Iberia and LATAM is strongly rooted in Spain, operating globally and facilitating connections in over a hundred countries with its compliance and electronic invoicing solutions.

integration.title: PROCUREDATA Node: Sovereign Bridge to European Data Spaces
integration.paragraph1: PROCUREDATA's value proposition aligns directly with the European Union's digital sovereignty strategy. The Data Act seeks to unlock industrial data to foster innovation, while the Gaia-X framework establishes the trust rules for secure exchange.
integration.paragraph2: SERES, by adopting PONTUS-X, automatically positions itself as a Gaia-X compatible actor, capable of interacting with Gaia-X Digital Clearing Houses (GXDCH) to verify identities and services. This is critical to maintain relevance in regulated sectors such as automotive (Catena-X) or aerospace.
